ProductSettings.name: ProductSettings
ProductSettings.label: Product Settings
ProductSettings.description: Represents ProductSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableCascadeActivateToRelatedPrices.description: enable Cascade Activate To Related Prices field of ProductSettings metadata component.

enableMySettings.description: enable My Settings field of ProductSettings metadata component.

enableQuantitySchedule.description: enable Quantity Schedule field of ProductSettings metadata component.

enableRevenueSchedule.description: enable Revenue Schedule field of ProductSettings metadata component.
